claim: User ID 13 used an automated bot to submit some of their negative comments on Codebase Community.
reasoning: The claim asserts that User ID 13 used an 'automated bot' to submit comments. The database schema has no column or table that records whether a comment was submitted by a bot or by a human. This is an out-of-schema concept that cannot be verified from the available data.

content.text:
I need to analyze this claim carefully before querying the database.

The claim states that "User ID 13 used an automated bot to submit some of their negative comments." This references the concept of an "automated bot" — let me check if the database schema has any information about whether submissions were made by bots.

input.description: List all tables in the database

content.content:
badges       postHistory  posts        users      
comments     postLinks    tags         votes

tool_use_result.stdout:
badges       postHistory  posts        users      
comments     postLinks    tags         votes

content.content:
CREATE TABLE comments
(
    Id              INTEGER          not null
        primary key,
    PostId          INTEGER          null,
    Score           INTEGER          null,
    Text            TEXT     null,
    CreationDate    DATETIME     null,
    UserId          INTEGER          null,
    UserDisplayName TEXT null,
        foreign key (PostId) references posts (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade,
        foreign key (UserId) references users (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade
);

tool_use_result.stdout:
CREATE TABLE comments
(
    Id              INTEGER          not null
        primary key,
    PostId          INTEGER          null,
    Score           INTEGER          null,
    Text            TEXT     null,
    CreationDate    DATETIME     null,
    UserId          INTEGER          null,
    UserDisplayName TEXT null,
        foreign key (PostId) references posts (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade,
        foreign key (UserId) references users (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade
);

content.content:
CREATE TABLE users
(
    Id              INTEGER          not null UNIQUE
        primary key,
    Reputation      INTEGER          null,
    CreationDate    DATETIME     null,
    DisplayName     TEXT null,
    LastAccessDate  DATETIME     null,
    WebsiteUrl      TEXT null,
    Location        TEXT null,
    AboutMe         TEXT     null,
    Views           INTEGER          null,
    UpVotes         INTEGER          null,
    DownVotes       INTEGER          null,
    AccountId       INTEGER          null,
    Age             INTEGER          null,
    ProfileImageUrl TEXT null
);

content.text:
The claim asserts that User ID 13 "used an automated bot" to submit comments. The database schema contains no information about whether comments were submitted by a bot or by a human. There are no columns in the `comments` table, `users` table, or any other table that track whether a submission was automated or manual.

This is an **out-of-schema** claim — the concept of "automated bot" is not represented anywhere in the database.
